titleStmt.title: An explanation of the drayning workes which have beene lately made for the Kings Maiestie in Cambridge shire by the direction of Sir Cornelius Virmuden wherein is discovered how the said Sir Cornelius hath abused the Kings Maiestie and many of his loving subjects / written by Andrewes Burrell.
titleStmt.author: Burrell, Andrewes.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
